stepAnswer: You need to step back from the data to be able to focus on the true "so what" (the story).
stepTitle: Why is it important to "forget the data"?
choices: You need to emulate an audience that knows nothing about your data to communicate it.
You need to forget your data and focus on the visuals.
You need to step back from the data to be able to focus on the true "so what" (the story in the data).
You need to step back from the data to be able to focus on the true "so what" (the story).
